name: Dinomaster Party
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

DINOMASTER PARTY

...brings you the most amazing baby dinosaurs in frantic, hilarious showdown action ! Who's going to be their new leader ?

  • 8 dinosaurs for you to choose from the Huge Diplodocus, the Mighty Triceratops, the Speedy Velociraptor, not to mention the Terrifying T-Rex and lots of others.
  • Challenge your friends in 4-player mode!
  • Cross 4 hostile worlds : jungle, mountains, volcanoes, the centre of the Earth; in an incredible graphic universe: living colour, Magna style - these are no ordinary dinosaurs !
  • Test yourself with 12 mini-games, all with their own unique gameplay : Meteor Shower, Rock Push, DinoSquare...

BIG Creatures, BIG Fun!
